name: Back in My Days
description:
A Game for Ludum Dare - 36 (Ancient Technology) - "Back In My Days"

When you're almost 86's and you can't support all those new technology and all you want are those old and good, bicycle, diskman, dolls and balls.

This old lady "Clarisse" is that kind of people, so help her in this runner to turn all those noise modern technology in something that she likes.

CONTROLS!!

ONLY MOUSE!!!!!

Click in those young people with new technology (RED) and than it will turn to old technology (GREEN), that's it, you'll earn points of doing that! yeeey :D

REMEMBER!!!!! YOU WILL LOOSE POINTS IF YOU CLICK IN ONE (GREEN) ITEM!!!

CREDITS!!!

Arthur Iung - @TuxLOL

(Game Designer - Programmer - Animator)

Christopher Chelles - @Pombiin

(Game Designer - 2D Artist - Creative Director)

Igor "Folz" Souza - @IgorFolz

(Game Designer - 2D Artist - Sound Designer)
